resources.string: Kindly be advised that Google Firebase is presently utilized for real-time database services. Users are reminded to exercise caution and use this service at their own discretion and risk. Your understanding and adherence to this notice are appreciated.
Explore public data seamlessly through this section.

For security purposes, please note that contact additions should be carried out individually, ensuring explicit permission is granted before inserting someone\'s identity into the system. Your cooperation in adhering to this protocol is greatly appreciated.
